projects.name: The Inventory Tracker
Description: Developed an easy pantry tracking application that allows the user to add, and query items to the inventory
It is a Single Page Application, that displays various pantry items.
It has a built in fine turned VGG16 image classifier pushed to the client side making the classification really fast.

The project aims to showcase the seamless integration of a Machine Learning Model with a modern frontend framework, providing users with the ability to scan items using camera, and update the item count in the inventory.

projects.name: The Cook Book
Technologies: AWS EC2 Linux Server - API Endpoints
Description: The cook book is a food recipe website that allows the users to search for their favorite food recipe.
It is a Single Page Application, that displays various food recipes using React for the front end and Django for the backend database server.

The project aims to showcase the seamless integration of a RESTful API with a modern frontend framework, providing users with features to filter and search for recipes and add reviews for each recipe.

projects.name: Sea Animal Classification
Description: Simple Python flask application that uses the fine tuned cnn model to predict sea animals.
The model can classify with an accuracy of 0.98.

projects.name: Session Based Movie Recommendation System
Description: Developed a web application with a Tensorflow Recommender-based model that provides movie recommendations based on the movies liked by the user in the current session.
Training and test are done on Google Colaboratory - T4 GPU.

projects.name: Binge Planner
Description: Created a web application that allows the user to search for their favorite movie/ series and add it to their calendar
Parallel processing of API queries using threading library improved the response speed by 50%

projects.name: Online Ticker Log
Description: The web app allows the users to keep track of their parking tickets
The user can filter based on the date and place to view their tickets
